opencontract-organization.id: Organization ID - unique using a mechanism similar to IATI org ID
opencontract-organization.name: Plain english name of the organization / department

contact.person-name: The name of the contact person at the organisation.
contact.telephone: The contact telephone number, if available. May be repeated for multiple numbers.
contact.email: The contact email address, if available. May be repeated for multiple addresses.
contact.mailing-address: The contact mailing address, if available.
contact.legal-representative: Name of legal representative for contracts
